languages.text: "Ты изменяешь свое тело, чтобы оно отражало твою преданность. Я — свое. Шрамы на моей коже складываются в молитвы, мучения — в истовую веру".
"You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."
languages.original_text: "Ты изменяешь свое тело, чтобы оно отражало твою преданность. Я — свое. Шрамы на моей коже складываются в молитвы, мучения — в истовую веру".

traits.locale_text: "You reshape your body so it reflects the depth of your devotion. I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."
"You reshape your body so it reflects the depth of your devotion. I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

"You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

languages.text: "Ihr gestaltet Euren Körper neu, auf dass er die Tiefe Eurer Hingabe widerspiegele. So gestalte auch ich den meinen neue. Die Narben auf meiner Haut werden zu Gebeten, und meine Pein wird zu Eifer."
languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr gestaltet Euren Körper neu, auf dass er die Tiefe Eurer Hingabe widerspiegele. So gestalte auch ich den meinen neue. Die Narben auf meiner Haut werden zu Gebeten, und meine Pein wird zu Eifer."

languages.text: « Vous remodelez votre corps de manière à ce qu'il reflète la profondeur de votre dévotion, et j'en fais de même de mon côté. Les cicatrices sur ma peau sont autant de prières, et mon tourment ne fait qu'attiser ma ferveur. »
languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

traits.locale_text: « Vous remodelez votre corps de manière à ce qu'il reflète la profondeur de votre dévotion, et j'en fais de même de mon côté. Les cicatrices sur ma peau sont autant de prières, et mon tourment ne fait qu'attiser ma ferveur. »

languages.text: «Al igual que usted reforma su cuerpo a imagen y semejanza de su devoción, yo altero el mío. Las cicatrices de mi piel son mis plegarias y el tormento que sufro alimenta mi fervor».
languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que usted reforma su cuerpo a imagen y semejanza de su devoción, yo altero el mío. Las cicatrices de mi piel son mis plegarias y el tormento que sufro alimenta mi fervor».

languages.text: 「あなたは自身の献身の深さを反映させるために、自分の体を作り替えている。だから、私も自分の体を作り替える。私の肌の傷跡は祈りとなり、私のあらゆる苦悩は熱意に変わる」
languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは自身の献身の深さを反映させるために、自分の体を作り替えている。だから、私も自分の体を作り替える。私の肌の傷跡は祈りとなり、私のあらゆる苦悩は熱意に変わる」

languages.text: “你重塑了你的身体，以此代表你的虔诚，而我也重塑了我的身体。我皮肤上所有的伤痕都化为了祷告，我承受的所有痛苦都变成了热忱。”
languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

traits.locale_text: “你重塑了你的身体，以此代表你的虔诚，而我也重塑了我的身体。我皮肤上所有的伤痕都化为了祷告，我承受的所有痛苦都变成了热忱。”

languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."

languages.text: "Kendini ne denli adadığını yansıtsın diye bedenine yeni bir şekil veriyorsun. Ben de aynısını yapıyorum. Derimdeki yara izleri dualarıma, çektiğim her bir çile de coşkuya dönüşür."
languages.original_text: "You reshape your body so that it may reflect the depth of your devotion. So too do I reshape mine. The scars on my skin become prayers, and my every torment turns into zeal."
